Tutorials¶

A step-by-step tutorial on using crease-ga for vesicle¶

We encourage the user to go through the jupyter notebook tutorial we have prepared. The link to the tutorial is here. In this tutorial, we provide a step-to-step explanation of the crease-ga code as applied to vesicles.
